We're excited to turn 100 and we want to celebrate with you!

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Please join us on Monday, December 9, to kick-off the ACLU's 2020 Centennial Celebration with ACLU-PA Executive Director Reggie Shuford.

Take the time to learn more about the ACLU-PA's initiatives and priorities going into the upcoming year and enjoy a happy hour reception with fellow supporters and ACLU-PA staff members.


RSVP by Friday, December 6, by contacting Marissa Kolarosky at 412-681-7736 x 329 or mkolarosky@aclupa.org

We hope you can join us!

Sincerely,

ACLU of Pennsylvania
